Header: Menswear designers reveal their Spring/Summer collections in New York
Content: Mens officially kicked off with designers debuting collections for spring/summer 2019. Among the first to show during the three-day event was first timer Michael Nelson, who presented his brand Amirok. Veteran designer David Hart turned his space into a crime scene to display his new line. The week will conclude on June 5th with over 20 designers showcasing new collections.
